title: New: Holy Other – Held
body:
Another of this year’s most eagerly awaited LPs, **Holy Other’s _Held_** released through Tri-Angle Records later in the year is shaping up to be mighty fine.

Treading the line between the likes of **Burial** and **Four Tet**, the title track taken from said record is perfect for night time listening, atmospheric and immerse, lulling the listener into an otherworldly trance. Check it out below.
